nodes.text: Zinn Kudri was a Dathomirian female technician and scavenger. During her youth she was rescued by the politician Tas Gallin and became her aide. She was present for Kaj Loomit's sabotage of a simulation chamber. She was marked with clan tattoos.
Zinn Kudri appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying adventure Begun, The Clone Wars Have!, released in 2019.
